title: Council of Trent
summary: The Council of Trent was part of the wider Counter Reformation, called by the Catholic Church to clarify Catholic doctrine and unity in the midst of #{Protestant} unorthodoxy. It endorsed the veneration of saints, the #{Seven Sacraments}, and the supremacy of the Pope. It also instituted some reform, creating seminaries to educate clergy. Furthermore, it condemned all #{Protestantism} as heresy.
